post.body: Behold the power of Twitter.
No joke! I got sick of that newsflash this morning and started watching cartoons. Children attend school. Whoop.
I used "noots," "package" and "bacon and eggs" at different times in reference to Recent Unfortunate Crosby Incident #1.
It's a govt-related job. For security reasons, my group can't have Web access. Others do, of course.
Well I'm going to be a data monkey. Not my job to be informed about the industry. That's for others, who DO get to have Web access.
I don't have any say over what they do or don't do with their computers. I'm just a monkey.
there's research security involved. it's a govt thing.
I wish. Instead, I'm pondering a Blackberry.
hockeywebcasts.com = awesome. Watching it at work (helps get through all the football I'm running). Thanks for the tip.
Crosby should be more embarrassed. Semin just looked really stupid. Crosby was disgraceful.
I LOVE puzzles! Haven't done one in years. Think I'll rectify that. Thx for the reminder.
Ha! No but he jerseyed him!
Rags 3, Pens 0 halfway through 3rd period- g'night Pens :/
This is my last week w/out a full-time job. Planning to be as irresponsible as possible while I still can.
At the station. Got WJC game online, but can't get PIT/NYR game to work. Bugger.
Wheeee I'm e-training! Obviously paying really close attention, too.
To clarify, some groups at work do not have Web access for security reasons. Of course, others do. It's not a cave. Blackberry, here I come?
New job orientation says NO INTERNET ACCESS while at work. *mild panic sets in*
Blackberry pearl 8130 smartphone - opinions?
Impromptu pizza party @commsplice last night. CUTE 2-yr old, great dog, weirdo friends demonstrating different 'pee-pee' dances. Good stuff.
